text: is a Japanese skier. He competed in the Nordic combineds at the 1994 Winter Olympics and the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1994 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Aomori Prefecture
title: Junichi Kogawa
